 Expected code:
# Preset variables:
g <- function(x) {return(x+1)}
X <- c(1,2,3,4,5,6)

# The code:
t01 <- g(10)  #A: 11
what_is_pi <- function() {
  return(pi)
}
squared <- function(x) {
  t <- x^2
  return(t)
}
t02 <- squared(100)
f1 <- function(arg_one, arg_two) {
  return (arg_one == arg_two)
}
h <- function(arg1, precision) {
  t <- round(arg1 + pi, precision)
  return(t)
}
X[3] <- 200
f_update <- function(v) {
  v[3] <- 200
  return(v)
}
